title: A treatise of the bulk and selvedge of the world wherein the greatness, littleness, and lastingness of bodies are freely handled : with an answer to Tentamine [sic] de Deo by S.P. ... / by N. Fairfax ...
author: Fairfax, Nathaniel, 1637-1690.
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
